front.title: IEEE Guide for Performing Arc-Flash Hazard Calculations_Amendment 1: Changes to Clause 4

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This guide provides techniques for designers and facility operators to apply in determining the arc-flash hazard distance and the incident energy to which employees could be exposed during their work on or near electricalequipment. The changes to Clause 4 are to make use of the knowledge and experience of those who have performed studies as a guide in applying the standard.
